tool_description:
Create a transcoded video file of custom dimensions.
Full API specs at https://stupeflix-tasks-api.readthedocs.org/en/latest/tasks.html#video-convert
name: Stupeflix video.convert - Transcode and Resize Videos
title: Stupeflix video.convert - Transcode and Resize Videos
tool_name: Stupeflix video.convert - Transcode and Resize Videos

api_list.name: video.convert create_file
api_list.description: Create and queue a video.convert Task, block until finished and redirect to output image file. Full API specs at https://stupeflix-tasks-api.readthedocs.org/en/latest/tasks.html#video-convert. Create API keys here : http://developer.stupeflix.com/dragon-keychain/new/
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stupeflixvideoconvert.p.rapidapi.com/create_file"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stupeflixvideoconvert.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://stupeflixvideoconvert.p.rapidapi.com/create_file"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stupeflixvideoconvert.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
